ourStory.story:
After more than 3 years of sharing love across thousands of miles, the day has finally come for us to be together under one roof.

We look forward to celebrating our special day and beginning a new journey with our dearest loved ones. Your presence and blessings are the most wonderful gifts we will always treasure!

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: After more than 3 years of loving each other, it's also been 3 years of learning how to love despite the distance. You often say we fell in love at a difficult time. Living apart, unable to help when the other struggles with daily challenges, yet we found beauty in our conversations, in sharing stories about work, life, and trivial moments. Distance made every story feel like precious light.
journey.paragraph2: Love is nurtured through sharing and understanding, through bickering and facing difficulties together, through late-night conversations lasting hours despite time differences. Despite the physical distance, we've been each other's greatest supporters and closest companions. We've become the source of strength, bringing smiles to each other even on the hardest days. There are moments of silence too, but they're comfortable - the kind where we simply exist together, peacefully connected across the miles.
journey.paragraph3: Perhaps it's because we've always been apart that we're even more excited and looking forward to the days we'll spend together. In June 2025, I proposed to you on Dreamland Beach in Bali, witnessed by the sunset and the waves crashing on the shore. It truly is the land of dreams where I achieved my life's dream, when I received that nod from the girl I love.
